attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yes the fireworks display over the Thames is pretty spectacular, but the atmosphere is so dull. A little music, and a live band should liven up the mood. After all, it should be a happy start to a new year.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the office of the Mayor of London.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
